welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Milliken, a charming town known for its friendly community and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay here."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Weld County Airport serves all commercial flights and provides various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Weld County Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipalcipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipalcipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Erie Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boulder Municipal Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Boulder Municipal Airport is available for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jeffco Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
